TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 按照声明性表达式指定的设置，从 Web.config 文件的 节中检索值。

span.span: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对中的值访问``Web.config 文件部分。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. ``的 Web.config 文件部分包含键/值对中的特定于应用程序的值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains application-specific values in key/value pairs. 通过将分配形式的表达式检索应用程序值An application value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: appSettingsKey %>` 控件声明中的属性。to a property in a control declaration. 冒号表示密钥后，冒号 （:） 前面的表达式的一部分指定要检索的表达式和该部件的类型。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the key. 前面的表达式将从 Web.config 文件中检索以下值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 当页分析器遇到与表达式`AppSettings`前缀，它将创建的实例类来处理该表达式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `AppSettings` prefix, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象生成代码，以从 Web.config 文件中检索指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code to retrieve the specified value from the Web.config file. 此代码执行期间生成的页类的执行。This code is executed during the execution of the generated page class. 如果将编译的页中遇到这种表达式对象在页分析和执行时从 Web.config 文件返回值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed and executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索在未编译页面中的应用程序设置值。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve an application settings value in a page that is not compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码从 Web.config 文件中检索以下表达式。This code retrieves the following expression from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 形式的表达式时调用此方法`<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>`时遇到的无编译页。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 它检索的键/值对中的相应值``Web.config 文件部分。It retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 此方法重写通过调用方法替换属性设置为`key`参数，属性属性设置为`propertyName`参数，而的`target`参数，因为`targetType`参数。This method overrides by calling the method with the property as the `key` parameter, the property on the property as the `propertyName` parameter, and the of the `target` parameter as the `targetType` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索相应的值中的键/值对从``Web.config 文件部分。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 它检索的值通过获取与作为索引键的属性。It retrieves the value by getting the property with the key as the index. 返回的类型是。The returned is of the type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索相应的值中的键/值对从``Web.config 文件部分。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 通过获取检索的值与作为索引键的属性。The value is retrieved by getting the property with the key as the index. 生成的字符串值转换为基于一种新型`targetType`和`propertyName`参数。The resulting string value is converted to a new type based on the `targetType` and `propertyName` parameters.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式用于在生成的页类中为属性赋值。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
A that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 CodeDOM 创建期间调用此方法的页面或控件。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回对象表示要添加到生成的页类中属性的分配的代码表达式。The returned object represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可在不编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现，并可以返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression. 必须在表达式的表达式生成器来在不编译页中计算实现。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 类在使其始终返回在未编译页面中支持的应用程序设置的评估`true`。The class supports evaluation of an application setting in a page that is not compiled, so it always returns `true`.
